speaker: LORENZO
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              we
               
              will
               
              slink
               
              away
               
              in
               
              supper
               
              time
              ,

speaker: LORENZO
text:
Disguise
               
              us
               
              at
               
              my
               
              lodging
              ,
               
              and
               
              return

speaker: LORENZO
text:
All
               
              in
               
              an
               
              hour
              .

speaker: GRATIANO
text:
We
               
              have
               
              not
               
              made
               
              good
               
              preparation
              .

speaker: SALARINO
text:
We
               
              have
               
              not
               
              spoke
               
              us
               
              yet
               
              of
               
              torchbearers
              .

speaker: SOLANIO
text:
’Tis
               
              vile
              ,
               
              unless
               
              it
               
              may
               
              be
               
              quaintly
               
              ordered
              ,

speaker: SOLANIO
text:
And
               
              better
               
              in
               
              my
               
              mind
               
              not
               
              undertook
              .

speaker: LORENZO
text:
’Tis
               
              now
               
              but
               
              four
               
              o’clock
              .
               
              We
               
              have
               
              two
               
              hours

speaker: LORENZO
text:
To
               
              furnish
               
              us
              .

speaker: LORENZO
text:
Friend
               
              Lancelet
              ,
               
              what’s
               
              the
               
              news
              ?

speaker: LANCELET
text: An it shall please you to break up this, it

speaker: LANCELET
text: shall seem to signify.

speaker: LORENZO
text:
I
               
              know
               
              the
               
              hand
              ;
               
              in
               
              faith
              ,
               
              ’tis
               
              a
               
              fair
               
              hand
              ,

speaker: LORENZO
text:
And
               
              whiter
               
              than
               
              the
               
              paper
               
              it
               
              writ
               
              on

speaker: LORENZO
text:
Is
               
              the
               
              fair
               
              hand
               
              that
               
              writ
              .

speaker: GRATIANO
text:
Love
               
              news
              ,
               
              in
               
              faith
              !

speaker: LANCELET
text: By your leave, sir.

speaker: LORENZO
text: Whither goest thou?

speaker: LANCELET
text: Marry, sir, to bid my old master the Jew to

speaker: LANCELET
text: sup tonight with my new master the Christian.

speaker: LORENZO
text:
Hold
               
              here
              ,
               
              take
               
              this
              .
              
                 
                Giving
                 
                him
                 
                money
                .
              
               
              Tell
               
              gentle
               
              Jessica

speaker: LORENZO
text:
I
               
              will
               
              not
               
              fail
               
              her
              .
               
              Speak
               
              it
               
              privately
              .

speaker: LORENZO
text:
Go
              ,
               
              gentlemen
              ,

speaker: LORENZO
text:
Will
               
              you
               
              prepare
               
              you
               
              for
               
              this
               
              masque
               
              tonight
              ?

speaker: LORENZO
text:
I
               
              am
               
              provided
               
              of
               
              a
               
              torchbearer
              .

speaker: SALARINO
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              marry
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              be
               
              gone
               
              about
               
              it
               
              straight
              .

speaker: SOLANIO
text:
And
               
              so
               
              will
               
              I
              .

speaker: LORENZO
text:
Meet
               
              me
               
              and
               
              Gratiano

speaker: LORENZO
text:
At
               
              Gratiano’s
               
              lodging
               
              some
               
              hour
               
              hence
              .

speaker: SALARINO
text: ’Tis good we do so.

speaker: GRATIANO
text:
Was
               
              not
               
              that
               
              letter
               
              from
               
              fair
               
              Jessica
              ?

speaker: LORENZO
text:
I
               
              must
               
              needs
               
              tell
               
              thee
               
              all
              .
               
              She
               
              hath
               
              directed

speaker: LORENZO
text:
How
               
              I
               
              shall
               
              take
               
              her
               
              from
               
              her
               
              father’s
               
              house
              ,

speaker: LORENZO
text:
What
               
              gold
               
              and
               
              jewels
               
              she
               
              is
               
              furnished
               
              with
              ,

speaker: LORENZO
text:
What
               
              page’s
               
              suit
               
              she
               
              hath
               
              in
               
              readiness
              .

speaker: LORENZO
text:
If
               
              e’er
               
              the
               
              Jew
               
              her
               
              father
               
              come
               
              to
               
              heaven
              ,

speaker: LORENZO
text:
It
               
              will
               
              be
               
              for
               
              his
               
              gentle
               
              daughter’s
               
              sake
              ;

speaker: LORENZO
text:
And
               
              never
               
              dare
               
              misfortune
               
              cross
               
              her
               
              foot

speaker: LORENZO
text:
Unless
               
              she
               
              do
               
              it
               
              under
               
              this
               
              excuse
              ,

speaker: LORENZO
text:
That
               
              she
               
              is
               
              issue
               
              to
               
              a
               
              faithless
               
              Jew
              .

speaker: LORENZO
text:
Come
              ,
               
              go
               
              with
               
              me
              .
               
              Peruse
               
              this
               
              as
               
              thou
               
              goest
              ;

speaker: LORENZO
text:
Fair
               
              Jessica
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              my
               
              torchbearer
              .
